## BufferedGeometryAccessorBase class

Geometry accessor for both indexed and nonindexed `BufferedGeometry`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class BufferedGeometryAccessorBase implements IGeometryAccessor 
```
